level.heading: Management of statutory trust.
level.text: The activities and affairs of a statutory trust shall be managed by or under the authority of its trustees.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 substituted "activities" for "business."

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 501 of the Uniform Statutory Trust Entity Act.
Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
